FuncDef: This command overrides specific attributes of the specified queue s CBS parameters.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the size parameter is an integer expression of the number of kilobytes reserved for the queue. If a value of 10 kbytes is desired, enter the value 10. A value of 0 specifies that no reserved buffers are required by the queue (a minimal reserved size can still be applied for scheduling purposes). Values-0 to 1048576, default.
